i1.name: Whisper
description: {{sbc|Innate - Death In 4 Acts:}} '''Jhin's''' [[basic attack]]s consume [[ammunition]] for 4 rounds. He will {{tt|reload|Jhin is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being [[out of combat]] and not being affected by {{tip|crowd control}}. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

'''Jhin's''' final round attack has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} versus champions, always {{tip|critically strike|critically strikes}} its target, including {{tip|turrets|structures}}, and also deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|15 to 25 for 3|1 to 11}} of the target's {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to non-structures.

{{sbc|Innate - Every Moment Matters:}} '''Jhin''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44|formula = 3% + 1% per level up to 9, then + 2% up to 11, then + 4% up to 18}}|attack damage}}{{ft|{{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}}% per 1% critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}}|{{as|(+ 30% of his critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ 25% of his '''bonus''' attack speed)}}}} {{as|AD}} as {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
Additionally, {{tip|critical strikes}} grant '''Jhin''' {{as|10%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.4}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition for 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being out of combat and not being affected by crowd control. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
Jhin's final round attack has an uncancelable windup versus champions, always critically strikes its target, including structures, and also deals 1 to 11 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage to non-structures.
Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44% − undefined% (based on level) AD as bonus attack damage.
Additionally, critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
i1.notes:
* The penalty to '''Jhin's''' {{as|critical damage}} also reduces the base damage ((100 + 75){{times}}0.86 rather than 100 + (75{{times}}0.86) and stacks with other sources (i.e {{ii|Infinity Edge}}) ((100 + 75 + 35){{times}}0.86).
** This penalty does not affect {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.
* The {{as|{{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} damage benefits from {{sti|life steal}}.
* The 4th attack cannot be canceled by '''Jhin''' himself.
* The 4th attack versus a structure is classified as a critical strike.
* The attack damage multiplier stacks additively with {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Dragon Slayer's}}.
* ''Every Moment Matters' '' bonus {{as|AD}} will benefit from any amount of {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, even in excess of an amount that would usually reach the attacks per second cap ({{fd|2.5}}).
** The maximum modifier without attack speed is 74%.
*** 44% base modifier at level 18.
*** 30% from critical strike chance on account of the 100% cap.
*** [[Attack speed#Reducing attack speed|Attack speed slows]] will not affect '''Jhin's''' bonus attack damage from his passive and will ignore his attack speed as it is fixed.
* Attack damage reductions apply before the multiplier causing them to be stronger against '''Jhin''' than advertised or versus other champions.

q1.name: Dancing Grenade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}. The canister then bounces to up to three additional nearby enemies beyond the first, dealing them the same damage.
The damage is increased by 35% of the '''base''' damage if the target the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jhin launches a canister at the target enemy, dealing them physical damage. The canister then bounces to up to three additional nearby enemies beyond the first, dealing them the same damage.
The damage is increased by 35% of the base damage if the target the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the canister from bouncing.

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 60% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input% AD) (+ % AP)

e1.name: Captive Audience
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jhin''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Lotus Trap'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
{{sbc|Passive - Beauty in Death:}} {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy {{tip|champions}} summon a free ''Blooming Lotus Trap'' under them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' places a ''Lotus Trap'' at the target location which, upon landing, becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} within its radius. The ''Lotus Trap Blooms'' upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming {{tip|sight|revealed}} for 4 seconds.

''Blooming Lotus Traps'' {{tip|slow}} enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught in the explosion. ''Lotus Traps'' deal 65% damage against non-champions and {{tip|champions}} who have been struck by another ''Lotus Trap'' in the last 1 second.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Passive - Beauty in Death: Takedowns on enemy champions summon a free Blooming Lotus Trap under them.
Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which, upon landing, becomes stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The Lotus Trap Blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming revealed for 4 seconds.
Blooming Lotus Traps slow enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before detonating, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught in the explosion. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against non-champions and champions who have been struck by another Lotus Trap in the last 1 second.
e1.notes:
* The ''Lotus Trap'' will stop upon encountering a {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* ''Beauty in Death'' does not trigger after killing a {{tip|clone}}.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between ''Captive Audience'' and {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 120% AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 78% AD) (+ 65% AP)
